P001125.project_name: Artisanal, Small and Medium Scale Enterprises Project

keywords.cdata: accounting,affiliate,agricultural credit,agriculture,Assets,audits,Balance Sheets,Bank Loans,Bank reform,banking services,Banking System,borrowing,Central Bank,commercial banks,consumer price index,Credit policies,CURRENT PRICES,debt,decentralization,deposits,development banks,Discount Rate,economic performance,economic structure,employment,Equity investments,Exchange Rate,exports,Financial institutions,Financial Performance,Financial Ratios,financial resources,Financial Sector,financial structure,Fiscal Year,Forecasts,foreign banks,Foreign Exchange,GDP,growth rate,Housing,imports,Income,income distribution,Inflation,inflation rate,inflation rates,interest rate,Interest Rates,laws,litigation,logging,maturities,national accounting,Net Worth,oil,Per capita income,public debt,public services,quotas,savings,technical assistance,term finance,timber,unemployment,Urban Development,value added,working capital

project_abstract.cdata: The project aims at improving the institutional setting for catering to the needs of small- and medium- scale enterprises. It will provide long term financing for Ivorian owned small- and medium-scale enterprises and artisans' cooperatives. It will also finance training for CCI staff and technical assistance. The project faces no special risks. The proposed Bank loan would provide for: (i) credit for the establishment and expansion of modern sector small-scale enterprises; (ii) credit for modern sector medium-scale enterprises; (iii) credit for artisans' cooperatives; (iv) technical assistance for CCI. All firms supported by the project would be majority Ivorian owned.
